Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. We believe it has the potential to significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and the high quality it offers, we are extending an exclusive offer to you. We propose to sell this product to you for $20000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the value we place on maintaining long-term relationships with our esteemed clients. Should you decide to accept this offer, we assure you of exceptional service and support throughout your journey with our product. If you need more information or have any questions, please feel free to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of working together. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
